title: Bound to Survive
description: In a realm where wizards govern, treachery is about to descend...Born of prophecy, a boy is torn from the love of his family and 'Bound' with magic to survive.Christopher is hidden from those who seek to destroy him.Over the years, he grows discontent...Until a secret is revealed...a journey begins...and a choice is made. A choice which will be for all in the realm.Join Christopher and his friends as they hatch a daring escape, race with them across the country in a bid to save his love from certain death and find out how a secret will change the world they live in. Bound to Survive is a tale of wizardly love, war and intrigue steeped in a mystical age of magic.“Evil lurks where good men fear to tread” ~Henry Du Laurent~
author: Sharon Gibbs
